metadata.synopsis: Astarion at the Epilogue party. Looking in the mirror

0.speaker: Astarion
0.context: NodeContext: Vampire Lord - Looking in a mirror and able to see his own reflection again.

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: I will never get tired of seeing that face.
1.context: NodeContext: Vampire Lord - Looking in a mirror and able to see his own reflection again.
